title: 我的世界bungeecord跨服群组服崩溃

replies.author: Coloured_glaze
replies.txt_content:
fred2006 发表于 2019-8-13 16:03
为什么进入后显示无效的会话？？、
online_mode: true
改为
online_mode: false

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 你的配置写错了，能上传让我看一看吗

replies.author: Coloured_glaze
replies.txt_content:
把config转码
转为utf-8
楼主应该是windows开服
windows开bc 每次启动会自动把config转化为ansi码
 在次启动要手动转为utf-8

replies.author: fred2006
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-13 15:34
你的配置写错了，能上传让我看一看吗
forge_support: false
connection_throttle_limit: 3
ip_forward: false
timeout: 30000
online_mode: true
log_commands: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25566
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - 大厅
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25566
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
connection_throttle: 6000
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
log_pings: true
player_limit: -1
prevent_proxy_connections: false
network_compression_threshold: 256
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
stats: 71afee37-7425-4e82-9a53-51be2e12faf5
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
servers:
  大厅:
    motd: '&e&l欢迎加入欢乐之巅服务器'
    address: 192.168.0.102:25565
    restricted: false

replies.txt_content:

转为utf-8
楼主应该是windows开服

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
fred2006 发表于 2019-8-13 16:03
为什么进入后显示无效的会话？？、
子服不需要开启正版验证
